Articles.Content:
this is my proof of concept/pre-release demo of the halo 1 final level rebuilt using kerbal konstructs in ksp!

 

 

Edited December 25, 2015 by amankd
Interesting fact here... my completion of that mission went about as smoothly as your flip-over at the end of that video. Love the burning hulks.

That looks great!

EDIT: Actually I'm curious if it's gonna be full size.

Edited October 31, 2015 by FungusForge

A game re-enactment inside another game using a mod that adds content into said game..

I love KSP
Didn't know Jeb was British with that driving position!
This is by far the coolest thing I've seen around here. The one game I've probably wasted more time in than KSP. If you let this die I will genuinely shed some manly tears.

Didn't know Jeb was British with that driving position!

Considering Jeb has been spotted driving a rocket from a duct-taped cushion, ripped from a recliner in the lounge, and a mostly-broken repair-bot control panel... I'd say driving positions are trivial.

Can I test this?

I want to test this.

This is awesome.

[quote name='njmksr']Can I test this?
I want to test this.
This is awesome.[/QUOTE]
i was going to get some more done but i may release an early alpha

[quote name='Gaalidas']Interesting fact here... my completion of that mission went about as smoothly as your flip-over at the end of that video. Love the burning hulks.[/QUOTE] as far as i am aware this is a first in kerbal konstructs history!

im glad you all so enthusiastic for my work (i was abit dissapointed by how few comments i got initially) and i will do my very best to get this to work
so it looks like kerbal konstrucs is busted atm, it looks like there may be a mm fix for now but it may not work in 1.1, but we can but hope

so people! good news! kerbal konstructs has an unofficial fix! so i ca push ahead with development, so far i have compleated 0:00-0:49 of my reference video, we intend to go to 2:00 for the first release, the vieo is 6:00 mins long

CHRISTMAS PREASANT FOR YOU ALL!! the next part of the hogrun is here , thanks to Joshua Johnson with tweaks and unity by moia
